Title: Makes special provisions for nominations and elections for county, town or village public offices and special elections for public office to be filled at any election to be held in the year 2021
Summary: Makes special provisions for nominations and elections for county, town or village public offices and special elections for public office to be filled at any election to be held in the year 2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to provide special provisions for nominations and elections for county, town or village public offices and special elections for public office to be filled at any election to be held in the year 2021; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
